pageContext.claim: “With all of the illegal acts that took place in the Clinton campaign & Obama Administration, there was never a special counsel appointed!”
pageContext.analysis: Trump repeatedly says he believed Hillary Clinton should face criminal charges for her use of a private email server as secretary of state, and that Clinton committed an illegal act. But then-FBI Director James Comey said his investigators did not find intentional mishandling of classified information, and did not recommend criminal charges.
